overview:
MarCom Professional with over 10 years of experience in digital online marketing, PR, communication, content development, event management, article syndication, etc.

With more than 5 years of experience in IT industry, Dhiren has deep functional knowledge of various business process in manufacturing, BFSI, FMCG, Retail and other domains.

Dhiren has good rapport with the media and analyst community. Manages website, blog and various other social media updates. Develops content for various marketing collateral like presentations, white papers, brochures, edm, newsletter, article, etc. Manages events right from strategy, planning, venue, invites, audience generation, online and onsite event promotion, pre and post event coverage, etc. Handled various lead generation activities like tele-marketing, email campaign, brand building, marketing, mailers, etc. Successfully launched online campaigns like survey, quiz, etc. Onsite quiz campaigns created by Dhiren were major achievements while working for MAIA Intelligence, a software product company in Business Intelligence space. Manages internal and external communication, public relations, press release, press announcements, press conference, meets, etc.
